channel.title: Programming, Assembly on andyvanee
channel.description: Recent content in Programming, Assembly on andyvanee

item.title: Assembly Language For Mac
item.description: I’m away from my Linux box and want to do some assembly programming. Mac installs GCC with the developer tools, but there are enough differences that I haven’t bothered to work through them until now.

item.title: RPN Calculator - v0.02
item.description: disclaimer: I copied this from my old blog. Not sure if it actually works:) My calculator code was quite easily polished up. Here’s the revised code which stacks operands properly and supports the main arithmetic operators +, -, * , /.
